channel.title: Pi oldschool source, combat problem
channel.description: Hello, ok so when ever i cast barrage or mage/ranged on someone or hit special attack it quickly runs up to the person. like lets say iwana range spec spec some1 and then, all the sudden, it runs up to the player. also, if i cast barage, it runs up to te person after casting it. any way to stop it?

item.title: Pi oldschool source, combat problem
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

Hello, ok so when ever i cast barrage or mage/ranged on someone or hit special attack it quickly runs up to the person. like lets say iwana range spec spec some1 and then, all the sudden, it runs up to the player. also, if i cast barage, it runs up to te person after casting it. any way to stop it?
